snippet.title: DAVIGO Launches November 29 on Steam and Meta Quest!
snippet.description:
In DAVIGO, become the GIANT in VR or a small KNIGHT on PC and fight your friends in local or online matches. Wishlist DAVIGO now on Steam or Meta Quest App Lab, then download the game next Wednesday!

If you've earned a pre-order through Patreon by donating $25USD or more, you can claim your key at keys.davigogame.com. Steam keys are available now and App Lab keys will be available on launch day.

The latest version expands on previous Alpha releases with updated art, 4 game modes, 7 official maps, mod.io support to download custom maps created with the DAVIGO Map Editor, and a range of new mechanics for more balanced, competitive play.

KNIGHTS can play for free by downloading DAVIGO KNIGHT'S PASS on Steam.

Thanks to all of our Patreon supporters who made this possible by funding the project, playtesting, and providing valuable feedback over the past 3 years. The DAVIGO Patreon will pause indefinitely on November 29th with the release of the game, and may restart in the future to support the development of new projects. We will update you with more information soon. DAVIGO will continue development post-launch to improve the game with your feedback. The full version is planned to release in early 2024.
